data.title: First English language edition
data.meta_description: New York: George Braziller, 1963. First English language edition. 252 pp. Yellow cloth, spine printed in black and white, with the dust jacket. Some toning to jacket, small chip at lower edge of front panel at spine. An early work by the Nobel Prize winner, translated by Richard Howard. Item #2369
data.text:
Simon, Claude

The Palace

New York: George Braziller, 1963. First English language edition. 252 pp. Yellow cloth, spine printed in black and white, with the dust jacket. Some toning to jacket, small chip at lower edge of front panel at spine. An early work by the Nobel Prize winner, translated by Richard Howard. Item #2369
